# Undergraduate Degree

I graduated with a **Bachelor of Science (BS) in Statistics** degree at the University of Illinois in May 2019. I also minored in *Leadership Studies* and *Business*. My GPA was 3.88.

<p></p>
<center>
<img class="imgheight" src="images/UI-Banner.png"> <img class="imgheight" src="images/UI-Campus.png"> 
<p></p>

## Courses Taken

### Statistics

Some of the Statistics Courses I have taken include:  

- **STAT** 385: Statistics Programming Methods            (Grade: A+)
- **STAT** 400: Statistics and Probability I              (Grade: A)
- **STAT** 410: Statistics and Probability II             (Grade: A-)
- **STAT** 420: Methods of Applied Statistics             (Grade: A)
- **STAT** 425: Applied Regression and Design             (Grade: A)
- **STAT** 432: Basics of Statistical Learning            (Grade: A)
- **STAT** 440: Statistical Data Management               (Grade: A)
- **STAT** 448: Advanced Data Analysis                    (Grade: A)

My GPA in STAT courses at the University of Illinois was 3.96.

***

### Leadership Studies
Some of the Leadership Studies Courses I have taken include:  

- **AGED** 230: Leadership Communications            (Grade: A)
- **AGED** 260: Introduction to Leadership Studies   (Grade: A+)
- **AGED** 380: Leadership in Groups and Teams       (Grade: A+)
- **AGED** 480: Collaborative Leadership             (Grade: A)

My GPA in Leadership courses at the University of Illinois was 4.00.

***

### Business

Some of the Business Courses I have taken include:  

- **BADM** 310: Management and Organizational Behavior  (Grade: A)
- **BADM** 320: Principles of Marketing                 (Grade: A+)
- **BADM** 340: Ethical Dilemmas of Business            (Grade: A+)
- **BADM** 350: IT for Networked Organizations          (Grade: A)
- **ACCY** 200: Fundamentals of Accounting              (Grade: A)
- **FIN** 221: Corporate Finance                        (Grade: A)

My GPA in Business courses at the University of Illinois was 4.00.
